tags: None
review: We‚Äôve been visiting Doctor Sailesh since the twins were born. We also get their vaccinations done with him. They‚Äôre 4 years old now and we swear by his recommendations & medicines. He hardly prescribes unnecessary medicines and explains queries in detail. He‚Äôs very patient with the kids.  My kids absolutely enjoy visiting him. Overall he‚Äôs a very warm, genuine, professional, knowledgable and kind doctor. Very difficult to find doctors like this these days. We recommend Dr. Shailesh to anyone looking for a good paediatrician. Thanks Doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Consultation provided for newborns ,Paediatric Emergency¬† Care,Pediatrics Critical Care,Childhood Infections,Pediatric Vaccinations,
review:
I owe this review to Neonatologist  Dr. Shrishailesh Mantur

We were blessed with twin babies on 2nd October 2020  at Apollo cradle Koramangala,  it was premature delivery of 32 weeks with babies' weights of 1.01 and 1.05.

we were sure from the words of Dr. Mekhala our gyno that nothing to worry about because Dr. Shrishailesh Mantur is there to take care of the babies.

NICU team were prepared well in advance, after birth they monitored and took extreme care of babies with proper counseling given to us each day.

Its always a tense situation for parents to see babies in NICU, but the timely treatment where instances of low HB blood transfusion were very well managed, necessary tests and scans were done to avoid further complications, proper information was given to us and I need to say this Apollo cradle is blessed to have such doctors. 

Dr. Shrishailesh gives us the comfort to ask endless queries, his confidence in treatment sets him as the best Neonatologist.

My babies stayed in NICU for 45 days and were discharged with the weight of 1.7 and 1.65, they were blessed to be taken care of so well by the best Neonatologist and NICU nurses who are always there 24hrs.

also while discharge they guided us with follow-up plans, vaccinations & feeding plans.

Thanks a ton, doctor !!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Newborn Jaundice,Childhood Infections,Pediatric Vaccinations,Paediatric care,All Pediatric Problems ,
review:
Doctor Shaliesh is one of the very finest pediatrician that I have met. Visiting him from the day my daughter was born.
He is very patient and kind. He diagnoses the problem properly, will listen to the parents very patiently. He also explains what is the problem, why this happens and what needs to be done to take care of the kid. Also he does not prescribe medication unnecessarily. We have gone for all the vaccinations to him. You can easily reach to him over a phone call incase of any confusion / followup if you are staying far. In-fact he suggests to call him sometimes for followups.
I have reached out to him many times when my kid falls ill and sometimes I am satisfied only after consulting him. 
One thing that stands out in him is that he is very passionate about his profession, very dedicated and sincere. To him it is very important to treat the kid right and he is not the one who does things for financial benefit. 
I remember he helped one of my friend‚Äôs daughter over a phone call during an emergency late in the night. He was on the call till my friends reached hospital by giving directions & he had spoken to the hospital in parallel & arranged a doctor by the time my friends reached the hospital in the night. He is always ready to help.
He is a very nice gentleman, excellent doctor more than anything he is a good Human Being and a great character who is there to help you always.
Thank you Dr. Shaliesh for everything you do and being there always for us.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have been taking my kids to see Dr.Shylesh for the past 3 years. He is terrific because he really cares about his patients. He's a doctor who listens to your concerns and then makes thoughtful recommendations. He's perfectly suited for pediatrics as he's patient and compassionate. Year ago when my son's was sick, he even called in the evening to check on him. You can't go wrong if your looking for a dedicated, honest, caring, brilliant MD! He doesnt prescribe more medicines for baby. doctor responds via messeage even after consultation which very comfortable to people who forget to ask while checkups.  So lucky to have such a wonderful pediatrician!! You're awesome Dr. SRISHYLESH !!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Its been close to 3 years we have been visiting Dr Srishailesh for my Child's vaccinations and Health issues. Being a first time  parent is an overwhelming feeling but if you have an awesome pediatrician like Dr. Shailesh then the journey is going to be very smooth for sure. He is a very friendly doctor who will give enough time to listen to all doubts and will answer them all very patiently. will never give unnecessary medicines. I have contacted him many times on odd hours too on phone for some emergency or to update him about my child's health  and he is always available. 
Thank you will be a very small word for you Doctor but my sincere thanks and regards for you. Please keep up the good work.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review:
Dr ShriShailesh, checked our son in 2017 on the day he was born and he has been our son's pediatrician ever since.

There is a popular belief that most of the doctors suffer from  God complex. Dr Shailesh is just exact opposite of that. 

He is exceptionally knowledgeable and experienced.  But the qualities that make him stand out are  his patience,  calm composure, fine  temperament and good listening skills.

We feel our son is in safe hands. He is the Doctor we trust our son with.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Excellent paediatrician.. I have been consulting Dr Shailesh for close to 2 yrs now. Very friendly and approachable..  We tend to get worried when it comes to our kids health issues and we sometimes repeatedly ask the same sort of questions.. Still the doctor explains without any hesitation until we are completely convinced. 
Would definitely recommend him .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I gave birth to my son on 10th feb after 1week only he got a pain in stomach so i went to the clinic nd that time dr.was not there but still the receptionist call the doctor nd the dr solve the problem nd suggest a mdcn nd within 15mint my son stomach pain gets normal its shows dat how much he is dedicated to his work nd hw much he cares for a baby..i will always be thankful to dr.shailesh ven't seen such a amazing dr in my life....

tags: None

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: We've been consulting Dr. Shailesh since our kid's birth at Apollo Cradle at Koramangala. We've been extremely satisfied every time we raise a concern, visit for vaccinations or consult for any paediatric health matters. The doctor listens patiently to our queries, does not prescribe medication unless required and explains to parents the root cause of any health matter. He is also available on phone for quick advise and often we seek his advise where we are unable to physically meet him. The doctor is reassuring and has clicked well for our kid.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr Srishailesh is the finest doctor I found for my kid.  He listens to the problem carefully then recommend medicine ,if needed, best thing is that he didn't recommend unnecessary medicine to baby. He is reachable by phone or text also whenever needed which is very helpful at times. He is very humble n his dedication towards his work is appreciated. I know him since past one year, my baby's all vaccines and consultation are done by him only. I am very much satisfied with his advice and treatment for my baby. ** **  *** *****

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: Dr.srishailesh is  really helpful to his patients..from day one of my child's birth we are in contact with Doctor..,The friendliness & cordiality in his behaviour gave us a lot of hope & confidence.Thanks for the advice  you have always provided me regarding my kid.,He always patiently answers all my questions. Doesn't prescribe unnecessary antibiotics and medicines unless and until required!  He is always available on phone.. Would strongly recommend him to others looking for Paediatrics treatment..over all good experience.makes the child feel comfortable and very pleasant experience..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Shrishailesh is unforgettable doctor for me, he is one who handed over my daughter after birth. From birth till date we have been visiting him for any problem or vaccination to my kid. He is very calm and listens to problem very patiently without any hurry, suggests proper medicine, avoids unnecessary antibiotics. After diagnose, he still asks us about any doubt  which might be in our mind. Several time we have contacted him on mobile on odd times, where he advised with medicines, that is awesome personality.
Thank Sir for your kind help and advices on odd time, you are the best in this professional, please continue. keep it up.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Sailesh is very friendly pediatrician. He first listens to everything what parents say and then answers to it and explains very well. He is always available on phone (anytime).  One Amazing quality that as a parent we like is that he keeps asking is there Any other problem or any other doubt regarding the child's health. The medicine he prescribes is very effective and he doesnt give antibiotics that early to any child waits untill the kid responds to the medicine only. I would suggest him to anyone who asks for a good pediatrician. Way to go Dr Sri Sailesh sir. All the very best..

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
hello, 
Dr.Shrishailes is my favourite doctor for my kid. his positive words will give boost for parents. he will takecare kids very well. i met only pediatrician Dr.Shrishailesh in bangalore. i never ever visit any other pediatrician. if any emergency i can ask my doubts via message he will  respond about my kids health. we are  really thankful to Dr.Shrishailesh. 
once we went for consultation that time more croud was there.. that time my kid had sever fever. he asked to take some test to confirm what fever it is. we were waiting for report.Dr timing was over. he can ask us to come tomorrow.. but he didn't do that. once attended last patient he came and told once you got report call me immediately at anytime. dont hesitate. it was around 9.45pm my  hubby called Dr with report. he suggested medicine and the procedure everything via phone. my kid cure in 5 days.. that's great for parents. hats off Dr.Shrishailesh

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
One of the finest paediatrician in bommanahalli/Begur Area. He listens to the problem carefully and then advise on the medicine. Most of the times medicines will not be required as he thinks we should avoid giving medicines to kids unnecessary if not required. We are visiting him since 2 years and never found any issue. In case of any emergency, he is available over phone and reachable which will certainly help you. 
He hears patients problem, queries very patiently and this is the main reason you notice there is a wait time to meet him. I am still okay with this. He is not behind money like others and one of the reasons you see long queue of parents to visit him. All the best doc, you are in one of the finest profession in the world. Keep it up.

review: Please try to give pre appointments or stick with your given time. Doctor came 30mins late said time. First come first serve is bad as it gets.
